com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

Interface IProcessSplitPaymentListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IProcessPaymentListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter

    public interface IProcessSplitPaymentListener
extends IProcessPaymentListener
    The listener interface for receiving IProcessPaymentService.doSplitPayment(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.Payment) operation callbacks. In order to register for callback events, an instance of this would needed to be set through the IProcessPaymentService.setProcessPaymentListener(IProcessPaymentListener) method. This must be set before invoking any of the service operations.

    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Since:
    3.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    ProcessPaymentListenerAdapter
